settings.heading: We’re not here to abandon tradition; we’re here to elevate it.
Bespoken Spirits was born from curiosity, frustration, and a cramped garage overflowing with whiskey experiments ——

settings.text: Our co-founder, a scientist at heart, questioned the industry’s slow, wasteful process—years of aging, lost angel’s share, and hefty price tags for a great bottle. So, like any good innovator, he got to work. Between stacks of test samples and a crowded laundry room, he experimented, studied, and refined his craft. What began as a personal mission to improve whiskey finishing became something much bigger. In 2018, Bespoken Spirits launched with a bold vision: to empower distillers, rectifiers, and retailers to customize spirits with precision and less waste—to “bespoke a spirit” for the world.

settings.heading: Today, that garage has evolved into a cutting-edge facility in Lexington, Kentucky—the heart of bourbon country.

settings.text: We’ve pioneered a transformative approach that redefines whiskey finishing, blending tradition with trailblazing innovation. Here’s where we stand apart: our approach allows us to unlock new recipes at record speed, harnessing exotic woods from every corner of the globe—Japanese Mizunara, Brazilian Amburana, and French Limousin oak—achieving complexity in a fraction of the time. But we’re not here to abandon tradition; we’re here to elevate it. For purists, we preserve whiskey’s rich heritage while delivering award-winning quality with unmatched efficiency, lower costs, and a reduced environmental footprint. It’s the best of both worlds: honoring the past while reimagining the future.

settings.heading: With visionaries like Silicon Valley titan TJ Rodgers, and famous short-seller Marc Cohodes, Bespoken is scaling new heights.
settings.text: We’re not just challenging convention—we’re rewriting it, bottle by bottle, inviting both traditionalists and trailblazers to savor the results
